description:
More protection for your irreplaceable brain. The Trace MIPS is the ultimate racing helmet, made to let you challenge your opponents with confidence. If you crash, MIPS technology will reduce the rotational force to your head, helping prevent brain injury more effectively than your average road helmet. Koroyd technology adds extra protection so you can focus on pushing your pace.

  • MIPS technology reduces rotational forces to the head in the event of a fall, lessening the potential damage to the brain
  • Koroyd and EPS provide consistent energy absorption to disperse impacts in the case of an accident
  • VaporFit rotary dial adjustment system lets you fine-tune the fit
  • AirEvac ventilation system pulls warm air from in front of your face to reduce fog build-up on glasses
  • Ultraight single layer webbing
  • 18 vents provide breathability to keep your head cool
  • XT2 anti-bacterial performance liner
  • Designed with eyewear integration in mind
name: Smith Trace MIPS Helmet - Unisex
